item.title: 2020 Democratic Debates dataset
item.description: This blog post introduces the transcripts of the U.S. Democratic primary debates available as data in the R package demdebates2020.

item.title: Visualizing Results of German Elections (2013 and 2017)
item.description: I recently got my hands on some German election data and here I play around with it a little bit.
